channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams says he won't quit the race and is the only one who can beat Mamdani

item.title: Trump delivers warning to Florida about the dangers of nixing school vaccine requirements
item.description: President Trump expressed skepticism over Florida's plan to end vaccine mandates for schoolchildren, which would make it the first state in the nation...

item.title: Trump says his Mimai golf resort will host the 2026 G20 summit
item.description: President Trump said next year's Group of 20 summit will be held at his Trump National Doral Miami golf resort.

item.title: Trump names Portland as another out-of-control city in need of National Guard troops
item.description: President Trump now has his eye on Portland, Oregon, as another city where he could send in the National Guard to help fight crime.

item.title: Top aide says Biden rarely met with his own communications team

item.title: The Trump Administration Plans to Crack Down on Immigration by Islamist Extremists

item.title: Third Military Buffer Zone Established Along U.S.-Mexico Border in Arizona
item.description: The “Yuma National Defense Area” at the southern border in Arizona allows the military to support the Trump administration’s whole-of-government appro...

item.title: Mass Immigration Lobby Peddling Stale, Obsolete Arguments Few Are Buying

item.title: Two Illegal Aliens Arrested, One Extradited to Florida for Triple Vehicular Homicide
item.description: Two illegal aliens from India have been arrested following a tractor-trailer accident in Florida that claimed three lives. The tragic incident undersc...

item.title: This City Figures it Can Help Illegal Aliens More by NOT Enacting Sanctuary Policies
item.description: The town of Easton, Pennsylvania, recently decided that the best way to protect illegal aliens would be by NOT adopting a formal sanctuary policy. The...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
